thread.title: Largest charity auction lots displayed in Beverly Hills

title: Largest charity auction lots displayed in Beverly Hills
text:
Largest charity auction lots displayed in Beverly Hills Thursday, April 05, 2018 - 01:08 
Works by Monet and Picasso owned by the Rockefellers are displayed in Beverly Hills ahead of what's described as the biggest charity auction in history. Rough Cut - no reporter narration ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
